DDL.statement: ALTER TABLE APP_CUSTOMER ADD OVERRIDE_BATCH_FORMAT VARCHAR2(1) DEFAULT 'N'
UPDATE APP_CUSTOMER SET OVERRIDE_BATCH_FORMAT = 'N'
ALTER TABLE APP_CUSTOMER ADD BATCH_FORMAT VARCHAR2(80) DEFAULT ''
ALTER TABLE APP_CUSTOMER ADD BATCH_VALIDATION VARCHAR2(80) DEFAULT ''
